data.event: Las Lajas began to fill the middle of this century due to livestock grazing activities in the summer then by the need for land for agricultural activities.

The first inhabitants were taking over large tracts of land and building the first homes, Rafael Flores said that the families were named Flores, Ulloa, Ponce, Buezo and Romero, founding the first quarter known as El Porvenir, thus arise first fence and the first properties of the slabs, without thinking that in the future would become a thriving community.
